alert.note: Alert for Owyhee Mountains; Southwest Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 10 at 4:36AM MST until January 10 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Southwest Highlands and Owyhee Mountains zones. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on hazardous road conditions. Whiteout conditions will cause dangerous travel. Strong winds could cause damage.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
